name: Serhii Bahirov
about: I am a Trainee/Junior Front-End Developer with basic knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Ready to start a career in IT, I learn quickly and am open to new challenges. I have over 4 years of experience in logistics, where I managed cargo transportation and organized warehouse operations. I worked with business clients, finding solutions to their problems with our company's products. I have good communication skills and can quickly adapt to new conditions, which will help me successfully start working in IT.

responsibilities: Monitoring and improving the system of interaction between units
Maintaining discipline and general unit organization
Providing professional support and problem-solving assistance
Active participation in company product sales
Organization and control of cargo transportation both abroad and within Ukraine
Responsibility for preparing necessary transportation documents
Organization of warehouse logistics for storage and efficient distribution of cargo
Coordination of cargo transportation to customer warehouses for timely receipt
Search and selection of reliable carriers, organizing their work and ensuring contract compliance
Interaction with customs, ensuring control over timely customs clearance
Performing field trips for topographic surveys and data collection
Processing collected data using computer programs

master.degree: Geodesy and Land Management - Master's Degree

bachelor.degree: Geodesy, Cartography and Land Management - Bachelor's Degree
